NewsItem.HEADLINE: Enterprise Mobile Infrastructure 2017
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report examines 8 vertical markets ranging from stadiums and airports to hotels, hospitals, shopping malls and offices. We provide cost estimates for various in-building wireless solutions and rationale for choosing various solutions.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: DAS, Small Cells, and Repeaters/Boosters are explored in depth, with special focus on CBRS small cells, DRS systems, and the use of Carrier Wi-Fi. A five-year forecast illustrates the growth of enterprise investment in mobile equipment.
